/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -O3 -std=c++14 -arch=sm_75 -rdc=true -Xcompiler -fopenmp -pthread --generate-code=arch=compute_75,code=[compute_75,sm_75] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/gknng.dir/main.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/gknng.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  libknncuda.a  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
